Package net.sf.javaml.distance

Implements algorithms that can measure the distance, similarity or correlation between Instances.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
DistanceMeasure A distance measure is an algorithm to calculate the distance, similarity or correlation between two instances.
 

Class Summary
AbstractCorrelation Abstract super class for all correlation measures.
AbstractDistance Abstract super class for all distance measures.
AbstractSimilarity Abstract super class for all similarity measures.
AngularDistance  
CachedDistance This class implements a wrapper around other distance measure to cache previously calculated distances.
ChebychevDistance  
ConsistencyIndex Consistency index for a pair of subsets.
CosineDistance This similarity based distance measure actually measures the angle between two vectors.
CosineSimilarity This similarity based distance measure actually measures the angle between two vectors.
EuclideanDistance This class implements the Euclidean distance.
JaccardIndexDistance Jaccard index.
JaccardIndexSimilarity Jaccard index.
LinearKernel  
MahalanobisDistance  
ManhattanDistance The Manhattan distance is the sum of the (absolute) differences of their coordinates.
MaxProductSimilarity Specialized similarity that takes the maximum product of two feature values.
MinkowskiDistance  
NormalizedEuclideanDistance A normalized version of the Euclidean distance.
NormalizedEuclideanSimilarity XXX DOC
NormDistance The norm distance or This class implements the Norm distance.
PearsonCorrelationCoefficient Calculates the Pearson Correlation Coeffient between two vectors.
PolynomialKernel  
RBFKernel The kernel method for measuring similarities between instances.
RBFKernelDistance  
SpearmanFootruleDistance TODO WRITE DOC
SpearmanRankCorrelation Calculates the Spearman rank correlation of two instances.
 

Package net.sf.javaml.distance Description

Implements algorithms that can measure the distance, similarity or correlation between Instances.
